extendedInfo.description: Waves of monsters are attacking your castle. They move fast, strike hard, and never give up. It's time to equip your BOW to fight! Can you defend your castle against intruders with your archery?How to play?# Touch screen to shoot arrows. # Drag and drop spell icon to cast a spell.# City Wall: Upgrade city wall to increase health point.# Mana: Mana is required to cast a spell. # Magic Tower: Upgrade magic tower to increase MANA.# Strength: Increase the damange of a arrow.# Agility: Increase shooting frequency.# Weapon: Select and equip proper bow to defend.# Power shot: Repel monsters.# Fatal Blow: Double damange with certain possibility.Watch out, intruders will be stronger and stronger. New BOSSES will come out as stage goes. Be the hero, and win the HONORS!Any suggestion/feedback is welcome!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: Great. Always Favourite
reviews.comment: I live both 1 and 2 however I wish this one would get an update increasing MAX UPGRADE then I can continue to play. Hope there\'s a defender 3 coming!!
reviews.author: Sam Gallon

reviews.title: Wonderful game
reviews.comment: I love playing this!  Works fantastic and is addictive fun :-D
reviews.author: Kevin Spence

reviews.title: Max levels too slow. Cannot go further.
reviews.comment: The max levels are way too low. You get to a point where you cannot go any further when playing nightmare mode. They need to be increased....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Money grab
reviews.comment: Downgraded from five stars to three.  Love the game, its addicting but I\'m level 60 I have 13 jems and the tower upgrade costs 30, spell upgrade another 15 and who knows what after that. I\'m NOT spending real money to buy Jems so please lower the requirements to upgrade jem related materials.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lee
reviews.comment: Got to level 350. I stopped playing for about a month. When I went back to play, my progress was gone. Rather than starting all over. I\'m just going to uninstall and rate 1 star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i\'m uninstalling this game.
reviews.comment: this game is so poor. it\'s too hard!!! we play games to entertain ourselves, but with this game instead of entertainment i loose my temper. there are too many enemies. this is impossible to finish!!! i\'m done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Decent enough game but the point system was developed by a monkey.  It encourages you to use crystals to gain magic, however those same crystals are what you need to level up your magic so If you do us them you cant level up.
reviews.author: Dave Graham

reviews.title: Fun but disappointing
reviews.comment: It was fun until I hit a wave I couldn\'t get past, only recourse was to buy gems for upgrades.  The enemies increase in health too fast, seems impossible to keep up with expensive upgrades
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: The boss levels are really hard (WAY harder then the level after them even), cash and gem income is very low (upgrades cost triples by the time prize is still 1000 gold and 2 gems per level), upgrades are expensive, but I\'m at level 112 or something and haven\'t spent any real money. It\'s a great game, keeps you challenged.
reviews.author: Jan Tom\305\241i\304\215

reviews.title: Eehh......
reviews.comment: Idk....it\'s okay. It\'s works perfectly well just my fingers get tired. Great game but not for me.
reviews.author: Jennifer Reid

reviews.title: 5 STARS
reviews.comment: hint when you start don\'t use crystals for anthing but upgrades if ur ganna die just die u still get money to upgrade other stuff I\'m at lvl 600

reviews.title: Must get
reviews.comment: It\'s so amazing to addictive what am I doing with my life

reviews.comment: i\'m at level 250. my multiple arrow is max upgrade and i own final fantasy bow without spending any money. i only repeat the game so many times :-P but what make me give 2 stars is it keep stop firing arrows at critical time. it makes me so frustrated. am i the only one with that problem?

reviews.title: Not good game
reviews.comment: The first level don\'t give any thing

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: This is a fantastic game! Good time waster and doesn\'t lag or have any problems in  game. One suggestion I could make is that you could add castle upgrades like more bow turrets that might just help a bit later on in the game etc
reviews.author: Joshua Ashworth

reviews.title: Kinda hard bro
reviews.comment: Can there be a feature that lets you go to previous stages? Im tired of seeing that \"game over\" screen!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To much of a jump
reviews.comment: The lower levels are fine but when you upgrade like 6 times and cause no additional damage, you end up facing waves you cannot defender. Cool concept, but very weak upgrade ability unless you start buying crystals...which was ignorant when Zynga did it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Defender is a awesome game
reviews.comment: I really like playing Defender. ^U^

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Level 250,000 crashes the app! But level 700 is pretty much impossible to beat with full upgrades. Fun game though even if I cheated

reviews.title: Defender
reviews.comment: I\'m at level 611 ... bored .. stuck unless I start paying again ... which I\'m not inclined to considering now the version 2 is out. Possible to adjust crystal ability stats as money is useless. Otherwise game becomes pointless.
